news_title: Binance Enables USD Withdrawals via SWIFT with BPay Global
news_subtitle: Binance now supports USD withdrawals via SWIFT, enhancing its global user services and lowering entry barriers. Read original article on coincu.com

news_title: Michael Saylor Makes the Case for Bitcoin as Corporate Treasury Asset
news_subtitle: Michael Saylor, executive chairman of Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy), continues to argue that Bitcoin represents the optimal treasury reserve asset for corporations, positioning it as a form of “digital gold” and a superior store of value compared with holding cash. Saylor’s c...

news_title: Steak ’n Shake Adds $10 Million Bitcoin to Treasury After Lightning Success
news_subtitle: The American fast-food chain Steak ’n Shake announced on Saturday, January 17, 2026, that it has added $10 million in Bitcoin to its corporate treasury. The move marks the company’s most direct treasury allocation to date and formally expands its internal Strategic Bitcoin Reserv...

news_title: Riot Platforms Teams Up with AMD for AI Data Center
news_subtitle: Riot Platforms collaborates with AMD for a 10-year AI data center initiative at the Rockdale Site, boosting stock and leveraging Bitcoin sales. Read original article on aicryptocore.com

news_title: Steak ’n Shake Invests $10M in Bitcoin for Strategic Reserve
